Field Detail

estimation

public int estimation
Estimation of total number of documents in the index matching this query. Full text search query result is usually limited by number of returned documents and query execution time. So there are can be more documents in the index matching this query than actually returned. This field provides estimation for total number of documents matching the query.

hits

public FullTextSearchHit[] hits
Full text search result hits

merge

Merge results of two searches

Parameters:
another - Full text search result to merge with this result
Returns:
Result set containing documents present in both result sets
